articles.title: "A Marvel": Amitabh Bachchan Takes Coastal Road Tunnel In Mumbai - NDTV
articles.description: The video amassed more than 50,000 views within minutes and users posted many comments on the post.
articles.content:
The first phase of the tunnel on Coastal Road in Mumbai was inaugurated on March 11.
Actor Amitabh Bachchan has posted a video of using a tunnel on the newly-inaugurated Coastal Road in Mumbai that … [+1918 chars]

articles.description: Randeep Hooda's "Swatantra Veer Savarkar" struggled to resonate with audiences, earning just Rs 11.35 crore in its first week and adding Rs 4.35 crore

articles.author: Hari Dubey
articles.title: YRKKH Imposes No-Affair Clause After Shehzada-Pratiksha's Termination, Confirms Rohit Purohit - Exclusive - Times Now
articles.description: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai actor Rohit Purohit spoke to Times Now/ Telly Talk exclusively and revealed that the makers have included a no-affair clause in the contract. Read below to know more
articles.content: YRKKH Introduces No-Affair Clause After Shehzada-Pratiksha's Termination, Confirms Rohit Purohit - Exclusive
